summary: The Director of Finance reports on a search of records to determine if any payment was made to Howard Hunt for approximately $30,000 that required no accounting. The office searched expense runs, Madrid Station, JMWAVE, and FR/Washington Office accountings, Mr. Hunt's travel claims, and Mr. Hunt's advance account. No operational expenditures were found except for $1,600 approved for write-off by Desmond Fitzgerald without further accounting.
title: Howard Hunt
